scripts.build:darwin: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin BUILD_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:darwin:dev: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin BUILD_ENV=development pnpm run build
scripts.build:darwin:staging: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin BUILD_ENV=staging pnpm run build
scripts.build:mac-x64: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin-x64 BUILD_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:mac-arm64: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin-arm64 BUILD_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:win32: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=win32 BUILD_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:win32:dev: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=win32 BUILD_ENV=development pnpm run build
scripts.build:win32:staging: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=win32 BUILD_ENV=staging pnpm run build
scripts.build:linux: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=linux BUILD_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:linux:dev: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=linux BUILD_ENV=development pnpm run build
scripts.build:linux:staging: cross-env BUILD_PLATFORM=linux BUILD_ENV=staging pnpm run build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:darwin && pnpm run build:win32 && pnpm run build:linux
